description.english: Completed the first day and successfully paid the boss.

description.schinese: 完成第一天工作并向老板缴纳了日薪。

description.english: Paid off all debts and accepted the boss's offer.

displayName.japanese: 川の水は冷たいですか？

description.english: Paid off all debts on 'Night Shift from Hell' difficulty.
description.german: Schulden auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad 'Höllische Nachtschicht' getilgt.
description.french: Rembourser toutes les dettes en difficulté 'Travail de nuit infernal'.
description.spanish: Liquidaste todas las deudas en dificultad 'Turno de noche infernal'.
description.latam: Pagaste la deuda en dificultad 'Turno nocturno infernal'.
description.portuguese: Liquidou as dívidas na dificuldade 'Turno da noite infernal'.
description.brazilian: Pagou as dívidas na dificuldade 'Plantão Noturno Infernal'.
description.schinese: 在“地狱夜班”难度下清偿了所有债务。
description.japanese: 難易度「地獄の夜勤」で借金をすべて完済した。
description.russian: Выплатил все долги на сложности «Адская ночная смена».
description.turkish: 'Cehennem Gece Mesaisi' zorluğunda tüm borçlarını temizledin.
